description: Number of iterations of A000005 required to reach 2 when started at n!.
formula: a(n)=A036459(A000142(n))=A036459(n!); a(n) is the smallest so that Nest[A000005, n, a(n)]=2
example: for n=108, a(108)=9 because the sequence of iterates is {108!,798687560466432000,7920,60,12,6,4,3,2}, length=9
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 24 2000
